events.description: Stop by our booth to meet the E-Board and learn about MDST.

events.title: Mass Meeting 1 (Location TBD)
events.description: Join us to hear more about MDST and how to become a member. Prospective members do not need to attend both mass meetings.

events.title: Tutorial - Python (Location TBD)
events.description: Develop essential Python skills for project participation.

events.title: Mass Meeting 2 @ Michigan Union (Wolverine Room)
events.description: Join us to hear more about MDST and how to become a member. Prospective members do not need to attend both mass meetings.

events.title: Tutorial - Data Science (Location TBD)
events.description: Build basic data science knowledge for project participation.

events.title: Project Exploration Fair (Location TBD)
events.description: Explore MDST projects this semester and choose your favorites to signup for.

events.title: Project Sign-Ups Due
events.description: Sign up for your preferred projects. New members submit tutorial checkpoints.

events.title: First Project Work Session @ BSB 1060
events.description: Meet your team and start work on your projects!
